sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
before a time or event
, se zgodi pred tistim časom ali dogodkom.

seg.quote: We arrived just before two o'clock.
Can I see you before you go, Helen?
A dozen ideas were considered before he decided on this plan.

sense.def:
Kadar se je nekaj zgodilo
the day before
, se je zgodilo dan prej.

seg.quote: It had rained the night before.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek nekaj storil
before
, je tisto storil ob prejšnji priložnosti.

seg.quote: Have you been to Greece before?
He stood before the door to the cellar.
He will appear before the magistrate.

sense.def:
Kadar je naloga ali težaven položaj
before someone
, se mora tisti človek soočiti z njim.

seg.quote: Let's get started. I have a difficult job before me.
